**Boss: Snakefist Guardian 
 -Element: Metal 
 -Deal physical damage to melee tank and ONLY metal magic damage to range tank. 
 -Occasionally, he does AoE metal magic attack to everyone in range. 
 -Frenzy/Enrage genie skills used after a while. This buff gets stronger overtime. That is why you need to kill this boss as quick as possible.
 
 **Boss: Vile: Snakefist Guardian 
 -Element: Metal 
 -Deal physical-damage to melee tank and ONLY metal magic damage to range tank. Magic damage is a single hit damage, not AoE.
 -Occasionally AoE stun the tank. The range of AoE is really small. 
 -Turns everyone in range (20 meters AoE or less) into frog. Frog can use normal aps attack, but not skills. Frog comes with a healing debuff.
